```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidycensus)
library(viridis)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
breakfast <- read_excel("C:/Users/abdul/Downloads/DSPG/2022_DSPG_Loudoun/shinyapp/data/Breakfast.xlsx",skip=0,col_names=TRUE)
plot_ly(breakfast, x = ~Year, y = ~Percent, color = ~School, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines', hoverinfo = "text", text = ~paste("School", School, "<br>", "Percent: ", Percent)) %>% layout(title = "Breakfast", xaxis = list(title = ""))
```
